name: XWUI Pagination Component
description: Pagination component for navigating through pages of content. Supports page size changer, quick jumper, total count display, and simple mode. Useful for tables, lists, and any paginated content.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

showSizeChanger.description: Whether to show page size changer dropdown

showQuickJumper.description: Whether to show quick jump to page input

showTotal.description: Whether to show total count display

simple.description: Whether to use simple pagination mode (prev/next only)

pageSizeOptions.description: Array of page size options for size changer

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the pagination

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component
